examples.title: Success-Response
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 OK
{
   "name": "Enters Lobby",
   "description": "Guest enters the lobby",
   "needsCompletionConfirmation": false,
   "expiresInMinutes": 2,
   "offerLimit": 2,
   "textMessage": "",
   "scriptSample": "Welcome to the hotel",
   "isTriggerEvent": true,
   "__v": 0,
   "directives": [
       "Welcome the guest",
       "Direct guest to front desk"
   ],
   "actors": [
      "bellhop",
       "frontDesk"
   ]
}
